The term studio audio has been around for years ..read "line" ..ok?

BAD NEWS... this has subs in Russian (like all other releases out right now). 

That wrecks the movie because (as you may know) it's a sci-fi thing where they jump around in time, and those subs tell you where/when they are, etc. It's basically worthless w/o them.

Picture quality is great otherwise, but you will ruin the movie if you don't wait. Just sayin.

Well it is possible to understand the captions cut and paste info from
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cloud_Atlas_%28film%29
 it tells the various story lines concisely

Ok then, i watched entire movie with no problem and i dont speek russian

A 7
V 10
M 7

I give audio a 7 because i had to turn it up all the way through most of the movie to hear it.  There are some subs in Russian, but such a small amount that it doesnt affect the movie at all in my opinion.
Audio is stereo (2 channel), read things carefully and avoid useless doubts. Thanks for the up mates!

So...

A -  Good, just very very low but at least the voice and effects are balanced and its synced ENGLISH!.

V - Fine, Not perfect like a normal screener. HOWEVER its fucking epic if you consider the file is only 700mb and the movie is almost 3 h long. Fantastic work!


M -  Haven't watched yet.

@crumrugin: So you suggest having a browser open to consult wikipedia *while* watching the movie, to try to figure out what's going on..? That might be the stupidest, most pathetic comment i've ever seen.
